0.1.name: wordpress/post-font-resizer
0.1.description:
There are different aged visitors in this blog. In few blogs content font are very small. As there are all kinds of bloggers many of them face problem to read small font written articles. Using this plugin you can change your blog's font size to larger or smaller as well as giving this option to visitors. As a result visitors can change font size according to their demand!

See Screenshot Tab

  • Or you can check it live by visiting my blog's http://bn.saifulislam.info any posts.
